```{r load-libraries, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(GGally)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(readr)
library(tidyr)
```

# Read data
```{r read-data}
spearmint_arcs <- read_tsv("spearmint-arcs.tsv")
```

# Tidy data
```{r tidy-data}
spearmint_arcs_tall <- spearmint_arcs %>%
	gather("Variable", "Value", -Index)
```

# Boxplot
```{r boxplot}
ggplot(spearmint_arcs_tall) +
	aes(x = 0, y = Value) +
	facet_wrap(~Variable, scales = "free") +
	geom_boxplot()
```

# Pairs plot
```{r pairsplot}
ggpairs(spearmint_arcs %>% select(-Index))
```

# Plot NG50 vs each parameter
```{r NG50}
ggplot(spearmint_arcs %>%
		gather("Variable", "Value", -NG50)) +
	aes(x = Value, y = NG50) +
	facet_wrap(~Variable, scales = "free") +
	geom_point()
```

# Table of Spearmint optimization
```{r tabulate-metrics}
kable(spearmint_arcs)
```
